anya-e1207n:12_0: Tahiṁ, tahiṁ suvitthiṇṇaṁ jinassa caritaṁ hitaṁ;
anya-e1207n:46_0: Dhanasāraṁ ihaṁ gayha gantuṁ yuttanti me pana.
anya-e1207n:106_0: Iti taṁ janataṁ pucchi kasmā sodhetha añjasaṁ.
anya-e1207n:118_0: Iti sotassa so tassa sukhaṁ dento jano’braviṁ.
anya-e1207n:124_0: Labhitvā visamaṁ ṭhānaṁ samaṁ kātuṁ samārabhi.
anya-e1207n:137_0: Dīgharattāma’laṁ taṁ me hitāya ca sukhāya ca;
anya-e1207n:144_0: Saṅghassa navako hutvā paviseyyaṁ puraṁ varaṁ.
anya-e1207n:147_0: Ayaṁ buddho’va’haṁ buddho hutvā loke anuttaro.
anya-e1207n:160_0: Āgantvāna tahiṁ ṭhānaṁ isiṁ paṅke nipannakaṁ;
anya-e1207n:169_0: Idaṁ vatvāna katvāna sasaṅgho taṁ padakkhiṇaṁ;
anya-e1207n:185_0: Kimuddhaṁ vā adho vā’pi disāsu vidisāsu ca.
anya-e1207n:193_0: Saṁsāre saṁsaranto so bahuṁ dukkhaṁ titikkhiya;
anya-e1207n:206_0: Kampayitvā mahiṁ dento sute cā’pi sakaṅgatāva.
anya-e1207n:402_0: Modiṁsu jalajā tasmiṁ jantavo pahasiṁsu ca.
anya-e1207n:438_0: ‘‘Jāto kira mahārāja putto te nuttaro sudhi.
anya-e1207n:451_0: Phāleyyamuddhā khalu tāpasassa paggayha so añjalimuttamassa;
anya-e1207n:454_0: Disvāna taṁ acchariyaṁ narindo devātidevassa sakatrajassa;
anya-e1207n:457_0: Yadā’si rañño puthuvappamaṅgalaṁ tadā puraṁ devapuraṁ’va sajjitaṁ;
anya-e1207n:458_0: Vibhūsitā tā janatā manoramā samāgatā tassa niketamuttamaṁ.
anya-e1207n:460_0: Vibhūsitaṅgo janatāhi tāhi so purakkhato bhūsanabhūsitatrajaṁ;
anya-e1207n:464_0: Sayāpayitvā bahimaṅgalaṁ taṁ udikkhituṁ dhātigaṇā gamiṁsu.
anya-e1207n:467_0: Nisajja dhīro sayane manuññe’jhānaṁ samāpajji katāvakāso.
anya-e1207n:469_0: Suvaṇṇabimbaṁ viya taṁ nisinnaṁ chāyañca tassā ṭhitame’va disvā;
anya-e1207n:473_0: Savandanaṁ me dutiya’nti vatvā puttassa pāde sirasā’bhivandi.
anya-e1207n:508_0: Sudassanīyaṁ viya nandanaṁ vanaṁ manoramuyyānama’gā mahāyaso.
anya-e1207n:539_0: Rājentaṁ sataraṁsi’ṁva rājaṁ disvā kathe si’daṁ.
anya-e1207n:541_0: ‘‘Yesaṁ sūnu ayaṁ dhīro yā ca jāyā imassa tu;
anya-e1207n:542_0: Te sabbe nibbutā nūna sadā’nūnaguṇassa ve’’.
anya-e1207n:544_0: Itī’disaṁ giraṁ sutvā manuññaṁ tāya bhāsitaṁ;
anya-e1207n:547_0: Sītalaṁ vimalaṁ hāriṁ hāraṁ taṁ rativaḍḍhanaṁ;
anya-e1207n:575_0: So channo patigaṇhitvā taṁ giraṁ tena bhāsitaṁ;
anya-e1207n:581_0: Pattharitvāna gacchantaṁ saddaṁ taṁ sakalaṁ puraṁ;
anya-e1207n:582_0: Sabbe suragaṇā tasmiṁ sotuṁ nā’daṁsu kassaci.
anya-e1207n:585_0: Passitvā paṭhamaṁ gantvā pacchā buddho bhavāma’haṁ.
anya-e1207n:605_0: Samattho assa ko tassā jahituṁ dehasampadaṁ;
anya-e1207n:609_0: Iti abravi channo so bhūpālassa yasassino.
anya-e1207n:624_0: Bhaveyya vivaṭaṁ dvāraṁ yena kenaci no sace.
anya-e1207n:633_0: Tassa cittaṁ viditvāna moditā gamane subhe;
anya-e1207n:639_0: ‘‘Mā nikkhami mahāvīra ito te sattame dine;
anya-e1207n:646_0: Gaccha tvami’dha mā tiṭṭha na’mhi rajjenamatthiko.
anya-e1207n:673_0: Itthaṁ tamhi pathe ramme vattamāne mahāmahe;
anya-e1207n:701_0: Patvā rājagahaṁ dhīro piṇḍāya cari subbato.
anya-e1207n:706_0: Ko’yaṁ sakko nukho brahmā māro nāgo’tiādinā;
anya-e1207n:713_0: Tamhā so ākulī katvā gantvā paṇḍavapabbataṁ.
anya-e1207n:725_0: Dhammaṁ desehi mayhanti buddho hutvā anuttaro.
anya-e1207n:740_0: Baliṁ dammī’ti gantvāna disvā tā dīpaduttamaṁ.
anya-e1207n:742_0: Dovo’ti saññāya udaggacittā pāyāsapātiṁ pavarassa datvā;
anya-e1207n:743_0: ‘‘Āsiṁsanā ijjhiyathā hi mayhaṁ tuyhampi sā sāmi samijjhitū’ti.’’
anya-e1207n:745_0: Icce’vaṁ vacanaṁ vatvā gatā tamhā varaṅganā;
anya-e1207n:799_0: Atha naṁ abbhutaṁ disvā mahāpañño vicintayi.
anya-e1207n:801_0: ‘‘Maṁsalohitamaṭṭhi ca nahārū ca taco ca me;
anya-e1207n:814_0: Vījayanto ṭhito tattha mandaṁ mandaṁ tigāvutaṁ.
anya-e1207n:826_0: Vattamāne tadā māro pāpimā iti cintayi.
anya-e1207n:884_0: Tampi disvā sasoko so gantvā dhīrassa santikaṁ;
anya-e1207n:890_0: Ko sakkhī’ti pavutto so ime sabbe’ti sakkhino;
anya-e1207n:896_0: Ko te siddhattha sakkhī’ti atha tenā’tulena’pi;
anya-e1207n:914_0: Taṁ mārasenaṁ sabhayaṁ sasokaṁ palāyamānaṁ iti devasaṅghā;
anya-e1207n:915_0: Disvāna mārassa parājayo’yaṁ jayo’ti siddhattha kumārakassa.
anya-e1207n:945_0: Ñatvā tāsaṁ vitakkaṁ taṁ sametuṁ santamānaso.
anya-e1207n:961_0: Mūle’pi rājayatanassa tassa tasmiṁ samāpattisukhampi vindaṁ;
anya-e1207n:977_0: Āsevaṁ takkaṇaṁ dhammaṁ imaṁ me paṭivijjhituṁ.
anya-e1207n:986_0: Dānaṁ nāma na dinnañca natthi sīlaṁ arakkhitaṁ.
anya-e1207n:992_0: Chejjādiṁ pāpunattena pāramī natthi kāci me.
anya-e1207n:995_0: Na kampittha ayaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ sarato’pi ca.
anya-e1207n:998_0: Na kampittha pakampittha pacchime pana yāmake.
anya-e1207n:1019_0: Nassati vata bho loko iti loko vinassati.
anya-e1207n:1050_0: Yasassī migadāyamuttamaṁ tahiṁ tapassī atha pañcavaggiyā.
anya-e1207n:1070_0: Samatthā nahi saṇṭhātuṁ sakāya katikāya te;
anya-e1207n:1184_0: Atha yodhasahassena tampi pesesi so’pi ca;
anya-e1207n:1220_0: Suṇitvā madhuraṁ tassa giraṁ lokahite rato;
anya-e1207n:1229_0: Dine dine vasitvāna yojane yojane jino;
anya-e1207n:1230_0: Dvīhi māsehi sampatto buddho jātapuraṁ varaṁ.
anya-e1207n:1242_0: Susajjitaṁ puraṁ patvā munindo taṁ manoramaṁ;
anya-e1207n:1257_0: Idaṁ vatvā nisīdiṁsu katvā te purato tato;
anya-e1207n:1260_0: Tesaṁ ajjhāsayaṁ ñatvā ‘‘na maṁ vandanti ñātayo;
anya-e1207n:1276_0: Bhūsite’kāsi te sabbe sākiya’ akaruṁ tathā.
anya-e1207n:1311_0: ‘‘Sakyapuṅgava te ne’sa vaṁso mā cara mā cara;
anya-e1207n:1312_0: Vaṁse putte’karājā’pi na piṇḍāya carī pure.’’
anya-e1207n:1336_0: Ahampa’jja na gaccheyyaṁ save bimbāya mandiraṁ.
anya-e1207n:1345_0: Pakampitā hemalatā’va bimbā bimbadharā satthu samīpa’māga.
anya-e1207n:1350_0: Rājā satthu pavedesi bimbāyā’ti bahuṁ guṇaṁ;
anya-e1207n:1362_0: ‘‘Sukhā’va chāyā te me’’ti uggirantaṁ giraṁ piyaṁ;
anya-e1207n:1363_0: ‘‘Dāyajjaṁ me dadāhī’ti dāyajjaṁ me dadāhi ca’’.
anya-e1207n:1394_0: Gambhīraṁ nipuṇaṁ dhammaṁ suṇitvā vimalaṁ varaṁ;
anya-e1207n:1404_0: Vihāre pavare datvā kārāpetvā bahuṁ dhanaṁ.
anya-e1207n:1424_0: Citraṁ gandhakuṭiṁ varaṁ suvipulaṁ kāresi bhūsekharaṁ.
anya-e1207n:1447_0: Dūtaṁ pāhesi so satthā sutvā dūtassa sāsanaṁ.
anya-e1207n:1453_0: Kumārā purato satthu nikkhamiṁsu surā yathā.
anya-e1207n:1490_0: Iti vipulayaso so tassa dhammaṁ kathetvā,
anya-e1207n:1608_0: Citaṁ yaṁ racayantena jinassa caritaṁ mayā;
anya-e1207n:1612_0: Tena saddhiṁ ciraṁ kālaṁ vindanto mahatiṁ siriṁ.
anya-e1207n:1623_0: Vyākato tena buddho yaṁ hessatīti anāgate;
anya-e1207n:1626_0: Saṁsāre saṁsaranto hi kapparukkho ca pāṇinaṁ;
anya-e1207n:1636_0: Mocayitvā varaṁ khemaṁ pāpuṇyeṁ sivaṁ puraṁ.
anya-e1207n:1645_0: Therena racitaṁ etaṁ sabbha saṁsevitaṁ sadā.
